data.message: Blob depth fixes for glassmorphism: (1) Force top/bottom contrast - large dark blob top-left, large bright blob bottom-right, one mid-tone blob at card edge for gradient seam. (2) Give blobs internal value - bright blob gets radial gradient (hot center, darker edge), dark blob gets subtle gradient (lighter edge, darker core). (3) Tint the glass with card overlay gradient (darker/warmer top â†’ transparent bottom). This mimics "glass has mood."
